title: ISO/CD 18977
description: Traditional Chinese medicine — Minimum requirements for herbal dispensing services
cleaned_text: Abstract This document specifies the safety requirements for herbal medicine dispensing facilities. It is applicable to facilities related to large-scale herbal dispensaries, in-house hospital dispensaries and medium to large commercial dispensaries. The specifications regarding tools and equipment used in these services are excluded. It does not apply to dispensing services in medical clinics where herbal preparations are dispensed to patients by or under the supervision of the prescribing practitioners. - Status: Under development - Edition: 1 - Technical Committee: [ISO/TC 249](/committee/598435.html)Traditional Chinese medicine - - ICS : Life cycle - NowUnder development ISO/CD 18977 [Stage: 30.00](#stages) This standard contributes to the following [Sustainable Development Goal](/sdgs.html) Got a question?
